name: Don't Touch Ranger Dick
description:
The Dankest HIGH...Score Game Ever!
Ranger Dick is coming! Save your friends and DON’T TOUCH RANGER DICK!

Tap-tap-tap your way to a HIGH score in this addictive one-touch green game from the makers of Pot Farm and Munchie Farm!

Ranger Dick is coming to take your stash! Save your friends and escape with all your kushy kush. Start with 10 seconds and get more time by saving friendly potheads and stoned critters as they flee the farm with you but don’t let Ranger Dick snatch your buds!
Look out for hippy Floyd as he smokes by and turns everything into gold! Play with your favorite Pot Farm characters and earn massive bonus points. How fast can your fingers tap?

No one likes a narc, though! Don’t let any of your puff puff pals fall out of sight, or you’ll lose valuable time on the clock. You’ll get busted if you run out of time!

Whatever you do... DON’T TOUCH RANGER DICK!
